name: [AI Tools 101] Simple auto-completion with OpenAI and Google Sheets
description: Learn how to automate text completion in Google Sheets using OpenAI's GPT models. This template is part of the [AI Tools 101 YouTube course series](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZF4ofwh6-to&list=PLrED3I754LhmTtlldfGklaEMh-ZaCa3EK&index=2&ab_channel=Make), providing step-by-step guidance to enhance your productivity with AI-driven solutions. Follow along to effortlessly generate and update content in your Google Sheets.
